p:
The average number of larvae born by females in the period of reproduction equal to d ( M
d ) in all generations was the highest in the control object (Table 1). Engine oil and diesel fuel in both doses applied, as well as the higher dose of petrol, resulted in a significant decrease in the value of M
d indicator in all generations of R. padi. In the third generation of R. padi, the value of M
d was also significantly lower after the application of a lower dose of petrol.
